name: Close and commit
summary: Convert tentative alignment into a concrete agreement: confirm key terms, resolve open items, and document the commitment and next steps.
counterparty_guidance: Confirm all material terms explicitly; surface hidden conditions before agreeing.
If they rush closure, slow down and check implementation details.
Use conditional language (‘subject to…’) when approvals or dependencies exist.

ui.card_summary: Lock the deal: confirm terms, remove surprises, and document next steps.

online_reference.title: 5 Dealmaking Tips for Closing the Deal (PON)
